channel.title: nginx on ALiang
channel.description: Recent content in nginx on ALiang

item.title: nginx配置
item.description: linux安装nginx并配置https、gzip模块 可以使用wget命令直接下载 1 wget http://nginx.org/download/nginx-1.19.6.tar.gz 将源码解压到 /usr/local/src 目录 1 tar -zxvf nginx-1.19.6.tar.gz -C /usr/local/src/ 安装依赖 1 yum -y install gcc pcre-devel zlib-devel
